min_price_offer.name: Liverpool vs Sunderland (incl. hotel!)

min_price_offer.name: Arsenal vs Brentford
min_price_offer.description: -Premium Padded seat on the Club Level, middle tier front 6 rows -Up to 4 seats together (ask the team for bigger groupings) -Official E-tickets -Pre-match food voucher to spend at Club Level restaurants -Complimentary pre-match drink vouchers, 4 per person. min_price_offer.name: Burnley vs Crystal Palace

min_price_offer.description: -All seats together -Block range: NW3434/NW3430 (rows 19 to 24) -Official e-tickets, safe delivery -Quadrant luxury padded seats -Complimentary meal deal (one hot food item, one drink, one snack) -Matchday program (collect by showing your match ticket at a kiosk on the North West Quadrant) -Complimentary Museum entry on a NON-MATCHDAY, redeemable by showing your match ticket at the North Stand reception -10% Megastore discount

min_price_offer.description: -Block range: 1-18, 32-48 -Shared box with up to 10 people -Etickets, safe delivery -Balcony seats directly outside the box -VIP Padded Executive Seating -The seats may be sold in any quantity -Drinks are included in the box -Food can be bought in the box

min_price_offer.name: Burnley vs Wolverhampton Wanderers
min_price_offer.description: - Block range: Shortside Lower 3-5 - Padded seating in the Jimmy McIlroy Stand (East Stand) - Access 2.5 hours before kick-off - Two course street food menu - main & dessert + half time snack - Relaxed seating within the lounge (first come first served basis) - Gaming area including table football and shuffleboards - Matchday programme & team sheet - Matchday compere & competition’s - Pay bar facility
